show.subtitle: Connect the Dots promotes health activism, linking personal health to the health of our culture, society, and environment.
show.title: Connect The Dots

title: Connect The Dots
content:
On this week’s Connect the Dots, Alison Rose Levy discusses new approaches to economics and finances via the Slow Money... <!--more--> movement with Woody Tasch, the author of “Inquiries into the Nature of Slow Money: Investing as if Food, Farms, and Fertility Mattered.” (Chelsea Green) <http://www.chelseagreen.
com/bookstore/item/inquiriesintothenatureofslowmoney:paperback> This coming week, the Slow Money Gathering convenes in San Francisco with a host of prominent speakers.
More information at: http://www.slowmoney.org/national-gathering/
